  Game information :
  ==================

  Sam is back for Gold this time with the complete First and Second Encounters, 
  plus loads of bonus stuff for you to enjoy. From the very beginning in the hot 
  Egyptian sands to the high snowy mountains in the Land of the Damned - Sam never 
  lets loose on the trigger. Enjoy a roller coaster ride of action, speed, swarms 
  of enemies and Sam's original humour.
  
  Serious Sam - Gold Edition offers:
  
  > The complete content from the First and Second Encounters  
  
  > The all new Episode "Dark Island" featuring 5 totally new levels and 
  environments  
  
  > A total of 30+ Single player levels crammed with puzzles and more enemies than 
  ever seen in a 1st Person Shooter  
  
  > Huge arsenal of 14 weapons, including the old favourites Shot Gun and Rocket 
  Launcher plus- Flame Thrower, Sniper Rifle and Chainsaw  
  
  > Players can join forces against the swarm of enemies in the critically 
  acclaimed co-operative play  
  
  This is a multi language release consisting of: English German Italian Spanish
  


  Installation Information : 
  ========================== 
  
  Just extract the archives and burn the .cue file with your favorite CD-Recording 
  software. Then install the game and enjoy !
  
                                                           /Team FairLight
